name: The Maze (itch) (berivanucan)
description:
The Player is trapped inside a maze and to escape, she needs to find the Nordic symbols that opens their respective doors. The player should follow the fairy (the familiar) who will guide her through the maze. Also beware of the monster! (Hint: You might hear his voice first)

You need to use three core magic spells to successfully escape from the maze.  You should use telekinesis to pick the symbols up and throw them to the doors to open them. You should use light ball to lighten up the maze and you should use fireball to fight the monster.

This game is one of the quests that will be featured in the final version of THE MAGICIAN which will be released as early access on Steam, at the end of 2021. 

You can follow the game here: https://www.instagram.com/themagician_game/ to see the development & design process. 

References & Credits: Monster and Fairy graphics and animations are from Mixamo.
